thread.title: Bachelor lesbians slammed: ‘They are faking it’
thread.title_full: Bachelor lesbians slammed: ‘They are faking it’

title: Bachelor lesbians slammed: ‘They are faking it’
text:
Share on Twitter 
FORMER Bachelor villain Keira Maguire has made explosive claims about the show’s first lesbian couple, Tiffany Scanlon and Megan Marx, insisting their relationship is fake. 
Late last year, the former contestants revealed they’d fallen in love after departing the competition to win Richie Strahan’s heart, and have been PDA-ing all over town ever since. 
But their ex-housemate Maguire apparently thinks it’s all for show. 
In a dramatic Instagram Live video, the former reality TV star answered a series of questions put to her by viewers, as reported by Mamamia . 
When one fan brought up Scanlon and Marx, Maguire was quick to shoot down the whole thing, insisting their post-show hook-up has been just one big publicity stunt, and warning people “don’t be fooled.” Keira isn’t buying the girls’ story. Source: Channel 10 
“So Tiffany and Megan are faking their relationship?” one person asked in the video comment section. 
“Yes they are faking their relationship,” Maguire replied. 
It’s a big claim: if Maguire is right, the couple has certainly committed to their “stunt,” having just moved to Bali together. A photo posted by Tiffany Scanlon (@tiffany_janes) on Jan 26, 2017 at 9:07pm PST
